name: Tall Tower
description:
You are a green square banished from society to a prison because of having a condition that made you grow 2 triangles on you instead of just being an ordinary square.

Now you have to climb a dangerous tower where you can lose minutes or even hours of progress in a matter of seconds.

It's all worth it because in the end when you finally reach the top and can finally gain your freedom.

THIS GAME POSES A CHALLENGE TO EVERYONE. NO MERCY WAS GIVEN IN THE PRODUCTION OF THIS GAME.

by the way this is my first game uploaded here.
